TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi PeerNameResolver extends System.Object

summary.span: 指定的值會使用 PNRP 命名空間提供者 API 通訊協定將 解析成 。

span.span: Specifies the values that resolve a to a using the PNRP Namespace Provider API protocol.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A其中包含的所有資訊中已發佈或查詢解析程序期間的雲端。A which contains all the information for the that was published in the or cloud(s) that were queried during the resolve process.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別預設的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new default instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已成功解決後，則包含指定的所有資訊已發佈的 cloud 中查詢期間作業。After successfully resolving a , the contains all the information for the specified that was published in the cloud(s) that were queried during the operation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void OnResolveCompleted(class System.Net.PeerToPeer.ResolveCompletedEventArgs e) cil managed

param.name: e
param.span: 包含 事件所傳回之資料的 物件。

span.span: The object that contains the data returned by the event.

summary.span: 引發 事件之後，傳回對等解析資料。

span.span: Returns peer resolution data after the event is raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是非同步的回呼，用來對等解析完成後，處理對等名稱解析資料。This method is an asynchronous callback used to process peer name resolution data after peer resolution has completed. 在衍生的類型可以覆寫此方法，以執行其他工作時的對等解析程式物件會引發事件。Derived types can override this method to perform additional tasks when the event is raised by the peer resolver object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void OnResolveProgressChanged(class System.Net.PeerToPeer.ResolveProgressChangedEventArgs e) cil managed

param.name: e
param.span: 物件，其中包含 事件傳回的對等名稱解析進度資訊。

span.span: object that contains peer name resolution progress information returned by the event.

summary.span: 當 事件引發時傳回對等解析進度資料。

span.span: Returns peer resolution progress data when the event is raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是用來處理對等解析資料之後已要求對等解析進度的非同步回呼。This method is an asynchronous callback used to process peer resolution data after peer resolution progress has been requested. 在衍生的類型可以覆寫此方法，以執行其他工作時就會發生事件。Derived types can override this method to perform additional tasks when the event occurs.

para.span: 在覆寫這個方法在衍生的型別中，務必呼叫基底型別的方法，讓已註冊的委派收到事件。

span.span: When overriding this method in a derived type, be sure to call the base type's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 使用 PNRP 通訊協定，將 物件解析成 。

span.span: Resolves a object to a using the PNRP protocol.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法將相關聯的對等名稱至雲端。This method associates peer names to clouds. 呼叫呼叫的方法大致方法中的每個對等名稱記錄。Calling the method is similar to calling the method for each peer name record in the . 請注意，使用個別的對等名稱記錄上的解決方法也不會使解決多個對等名稱。Note that using the Resolve method on an individual peer name record does not invalidate resolving multiple peer names. 針對每個方法，沒有對等項目方法。For every method, there is an equivalent method. 它們是相同的參數傳遞，，不同之處在於 ResolveAsync 方法的非同步事件處理其參數清單中包含系統語彙基元。They are identical in the parameters they are passed, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token in its parameter list for asynchronous event handling. 如果未提供參數，此方法會使用填寫雲端參數的捷徑。If the parameter is not supplied, the method uses the shortcut to fill in cloud parameters. 如果`maxRecords`遺漏參數，預設值零會導致擲回的例外狀況。If the `maxRecords` parameter is missing, the default value of zero causes an exception to be thrown. 如果解析作業完成，發生錯誤或已取消，也會引發此事件。This event will also be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecordCollection Resolve(class System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName peerName) cil managed

param.name: peerName
param.span: 要解析的 。

span.span: The to resolve.

summary.span: 解析呼叫端對等電腦已知的所有 Cloud 中的特定 。

span.span: Resolves the specified in all clouds known to the calling peer.

returns.span: ，內含與指定的對等名稱相關聯的所有對等名稱記錄 (表示為 物件)。

span.span: A that contains all peer name records (represented as objects) associated with the specified peer name.

returns.span: 對於不安全的對等個體名稱，相同的 可由不同的使用者在相同的 中登錄，並與不同的端點產生關聯。

span.span: For unsecured peer names, the same can be registered by different users in the same , and associated with different endpoints.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會將對等名稱至雲端。This method associates a peer name to clouds. 所有雲端會都查詢進行。All clouds are queried for the . 如果無法解析的對等名稱，或者是`null`、就會擲回。If the peer name cannot be resolved or is `null`, an is thrown. 不安全的對等名稱，相同的名稱可以是註冊 （且具有不同端點相關聯） 的相同雲端內的不同對等。For unsecured peer names, the same name can be registered (and associated with different endpoints) by different peers within the same cloud. 呼叫呼叫的方法大致方法中的每個對等名稱記錄。Calling the method is similar to calling the method for each peer name record in the . 請注意，使用個別的對等名稱記錄上的解決方法也不會使解決多個對等名稱。Note that using the Resolve method on an individual peer name record does not invalidate resolving multiple peer names. 針對每個方法，沒有對等項目方法。For every method, there is an equivalent method. 參數清單完全相同，但是個 ResolveAsync 方法包括非同步事件處理系統語彙基元。Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling. 如果未提供參數，此方法會使用填寫雲端參數的捷徑。If the parameter is not supplied, the method uses the shortcut to fill in cloud parameters. 如果解析作業完成，發生錯誤或已取消，就會引發事件。The event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何解決中任何發行。The following code example illustrates how to resolve a published in any . [!code-csharp[NCLPNRPPeerNameResolver#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLPNRPPeerNameResolver/CS/PeerNameResolver.cs#1)]

span.span: The parameter is set to .

exception.span: 無法解析指定的對等名稱。

span.span: The peer name specified cannot be resolved.

param.span: 要解析的 。

summary.span: 解析呼叫端對等電腦已知的所有 Cloud 中的特定對等名稱，並傳回指定數目範圍內的 物件。

span.span: Resolves the specified peer name in all clouds known to the calling peer, returning no more than the specified number of objects.

returns.span: ，其大小小於或等於 項目。

span.span: A whose size is less than or equal to entries.

span.span: This collection contains peer name records associated with the that was resolved.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會將對等名稱至雲端。This method associates a peer name to clouds. 查詢所有雲端的對等名稱。All clouds are queried for the peer name. 不安全的對等名稱，相同的對等名稱可以由不同的使用者在同一個註冊，以及與不同的端點相關聯。For unsecured peer names, the same peer name can be registered by different users in the same , and associated with different endpoints. 如果無法解析 （比方說，不會發行對等名稱）就會擲回。If the cannot be resolved (for example, the peer name is not published) an is thrown. 針對每個方法，沒有對等項目方法。For every method, there is an equivalent method. 參數清單完全相同，但是個 ResolveAsync 方法包括非同步事件處理系統語彙基元。Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling. 如果解析作業完成，發生錯誤或已取消，就會引發事件。The event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.

span.span: The parameter is set to .
The parameter is less than or equal to zero.

exception.span: 提供的對等名稱無法解析。

span.span: The supplied peer name cannot be resolved.

span.span: Resolves the specified in the specified .

returns.span: ，內含與指定的對等名稱相關聯的所有對等名稱記錄 (表示為 物件)。

span.span: that contains all peer name records (represented as objects) associated with the specified peer name.

returns.span: 對於不安全的對等個體名稱，相同的 可由不同的使用者在相同的 中登錄，並與不同的端點產生關聯。

span.span: For unsecured peer names, the same can be registered by different users in the same , and associated with different endpoints.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果無法解析 （亦即，尚未發行對等名稱）就會擲回。If the cannot be resolved (i.e., the peer name is not published) an is thrown. 不安全的對等名稱，相同的名稱可以是註冊 （且具有不同端點相關聯） 的相同雲端內的不同對等。For unsecured peer names, the same name can be registered (and associated with different endpoints) by different peers within the same cloud. 針對每個方法，沒有對等項目方法。For every method, there is an equivalent method. 參數清單完全相同，但是個 ResolveAsync 方法包括非同步事件處理系統語彙基元。Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling. 如果參數是`null`，則會使用捷徑來填寫， ，和。If the parameter is `null`, the uses the shortcut to fill in the , , and . 如果解析作業完成，發生錯誤或已取消，就會引發事件。The event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不安全的對等名稱，相同的名稱可以是註冊 （且具有不同端點相關聯） 的相同雲端內的不同對等。For unsecured peer names, the same name can be registered (and associated with different endpoints) by different peers within the same cloud. 如果對等名稱不能解析，就會擲回。If the peer name cannot be resolved, an is thrown. 針對每個方法，沒有對等項目方法。For every method, there is an equivalent method. 參數清單完全相同，但是個 ResolveAsync 方法包括非同步事件處理系統語彙基元。Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling. 如果參數是`null`，則會使用捷徑來填寫， ，和。If the parameter is `null`, the uses the shortcut to fill in the , , and . 如果解析作業完成，發生錯誤或已取消，就會引發事件。The event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.

summary.span: 這些方法會在呼叫端對等電腦已知的所有 Cloud 中，針對指定的 開始進行非同步解析作業。

span.span: These methods begin an asynchronous resolution operation for the specified in all clouds known to the calling peer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 針對每個方法，沒有對等項目方法，這會需要非同步處理時。For every method, there is an equivalent method, which is used when asynchronous processing is required. 它們是相同的參數傳遞，，不同之處在於 ResolveAsync 系統語彙基元清單中包含其參數來處理事件。They are identical in the parameters they are passed, except that ResolveAsync includes a system token in its parameter list for event handling. 如果參數不相符，就會發生的解決方法和 ResolveAsync 方法之間，而未提供參數，此方法會使用填寫雲端參數的捷徑。If a parameter mismatch occurs between the Resolve method and the ResolveAsync method, and the parameter is not supplied, the method uses the shortcut to fill in cloud parameters.

MemberSignature.Value: public void ResolveAsync (System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName peerName, object userState);

param.span: 要解析的 。

summary.span: 在所有雲端中針對呼叫對等已知的指定 開始非同步對等名稱解析作業。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous peer name resolution operation for the specified in all clouds known to the calling peer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法以非同步方式將對等名稱至雲端。This method asynchronously associates a peer name to clouds. 所有雲端會都查詢進行。All clouds are queried for the . 它會引發事件，這會回呼方法。It raises the event, which calls back to the method. 或者，它會引發事件，這會回呼方法。Or, it raises the event, which calls back to the method. 如果對等名稱不能解析，就會擲回。If the peer name cannot be resolved, an is thrown. 不安全的對等名稱，相同的名稱可以是註冊 （且具有不同端點相關聯） 的相同雲端內的不同對等。For unsecured peer names, the same name can be registered (and associated with different endpoints) by different peers within the same cloud. 呼叫呼叫的方法大致方法中的每個對等名稱記錄。Calling the method is similar to calling the method for each peer name record in the . 請注意，使用個別的對等名稱記錄上的解決方法也不會使解決多個對等名稱。Note that using the Resolve method on an individual peer name record does not invalidate resolving multiple peer names. 針對每個方法，沒有對等項目方法。For every method, there is an equivalent method. 參數清單完全相同，但是個 ResolveAsync 方法包括非同步事件處理系統語彙基元，解決方法僅適用於同步處理。Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling, and the Resolve method is intended for synchronous processing. 非同步解析程式物件係協調與唯一識別項語彙基元。All asynchronous references to the resolver object are coordinated with a unique identifier token. 這`userState`語彙基元或訊息的識別項可讓作業系統訊息已置於郵件佇列之後，就將訊息傳遞到單一的接收處理序。This `userState` token or message identifier allows an operating system to deliver a message to a single receiving process after the message has been placed on the message queue. 如果解析作業完成，發生錯誤或已取消，就會引發事件。The event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.

exception.span: 和 參數之一或二者設為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法以非同步方式將對等名稱至雲端。This method asynchronously associates a peer name to clouds. 所有雲端會都查詢進行。All clouds are queried for the . 不安全的對等名稱，相同的名稱可以是註冊 （且具有不同端點相關聯） 的相同雲端內的不同對等。For unsecured peer names, the same name can be registered (and associated with different endpoints) by different peers within the same cloud. 如果無法解析的對等名稱，或者是`null`、就會擲回。If the peer name cannot be resolved or is `null`, an is thrown. 這個方法會引發事件，這會回呼方法。This method raises the event, which calls back to the method. 或者，它會引發事件，這會回呼方法。Or, it raises the event, which calls back to the method. 針對每個方法，沒有對等項目方法。For every method, there is an equivalent method. 參數清單完全相同，但是個 ResolveAsync 方法包括非同步事件處理系統語彙基元，解決方法僅適用於同步處理。Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling, and the Resolve method is intended for synchronous processing. 非同步解析程式物件係使用唯一的識別項語彙基元協調。All asynchronous references to the resolver object are coordinated with a unique identifier token . 這`userState`語彙基元或訊息的識別項可讓作業系統訊息已置於郵件佇列之後，就將訊息傳遞到單一的接收處理序。This `userState` token or message identifier allows an operating system to deliver a message to a single receiving process after the message has been placed on the message queue. 如果解析作業完成，發生錯誤或已取消，就會引發事件。The event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會引發事件，這會回呼方法。This method raises the event, which calls back to the method. 或者，它會引發事件，這會回呼方法。Or, it raises the event, which calls back to the method. 不安全的對等名稱，相同的名稱可以是註冊 （且具有不同端點相關聯） 的相同雲端內的不同對等。For unsecured peer names, the same name can be registered (and associated with different endpoints) by different peers within the same cloud. 如果參數是`null`，即完成名稱解析使用捷徑，用來初始化的預設值， ，和屬性。If the parameter is `null`, the name is resolved using the shortcut, which initializes default values for the , , and properties. 針對每個方法，沒有對等項目方法。For every method, there is an equivalent method. 參數清單完全相同，但是個 ResolveAsync 方法包括非同步事件處理系統語彙基元，解決方法僅適用於同步處理。Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling, and the Resolve method is intended for synchronous processing. 非同步解析程式物件係協調與唯一識別項語彙基元。All asynchronous references to the resolver object are coordinated with a unique identifier token. 這`userState`語彙基元或訊息的識別項可讓作業系統訊息已置於郵件佇列之後，就將訊息傳遞到單一的接收處理序。This `userState` token or message identifier allows an operating system to deliver a message to a single receiving process after the message has been placed on the message queue. 如果解析作業完成，發生錯誤或已取消，就會引發事件。The event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.

span.span: A user-defined object that contains information about the peer name resolution operation.

summary.span: 在指定的 中針對指定 ，開始非同步對等名稱解析作業。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous peer name resolution operation for the specified in the specified .

summary.span: 解析作業針對指定的對等名稱將不會解析超過 個項目。

span.span: The resolution operation will resolve no more than entries for the specified peer name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不安全的對等名稱，相同的名稱可以是註冊 （且具有不同端點相關聯） 的相同雲端內的不同對等。For unsecured peer names, the same name can be registered (and associated with different endpoints) by different peers within the same cloud. 這個方法會引發事件，這會回呼方法。This method raises the event, which calls back to the method. 或者，它會引發事件，這會回呼方法。Or, it raises the event, which calls back to the method. 如果參數是`null`，即完成名稱解析使用捷徑，用來初始化的預設值， ，和屬性。If the parameter is `null`, the name is resolved using the shortcut, which initializes default values for the , , and properties. 針對每個方法，沒有對等項目方法。For every method, there is an equivalent method. 參數清單完全相同，但是個 ResolveAsync 方法包括非同步事件處理系統語彙基元，解決方法僅適用於同步處理。Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling, and the Resolve method is intended for synchronous processing. 非同步對等解析程式物件係使用唯一的識別項語彙基元協調。All asynchronous references to the peer resolver object are coordinated with a unique identifier token . 這`userState`語彙基元或訊息的識別項可讓作業系統訊息已置於郵件佇列之後，就將訊息傳遞到單一的接收處理序。This `userState` token or message identifier allows an operating system to deliver a message to a single receiving process after the message has been placed on the message queue. 如果解析作業完成，發生錯誤或已取消，就會引發事件。The event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.

exception.span: 和 參數之一或二者設為 。

exception.span: 一或多個提供的參數無效。

span.span: One or more supplied parameters are invalid.

exception.span: 至少需要一個事件處理常式才能成功完成此作業。

span.span: Successful completion of this operation requires at least one event handler.
The parameter is less than or equal to zero.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ResolveAsyncCancel(object userState) cil managed

param.name: userState
param.span: 提供給啟動解析作業的 方法執行個體的物件。

span.span: The object provided to the method instance which started the resolve operation.

summary.span: 取消指定的非同步對等名稱解析要求。

span.span: Cancels the specified asynchronous peer name resolution request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法可確保系統不會嘗試取得指定的其他記錄。Calling this method guarantees the system will not attempt to obtain additional records for the specified . 如果無法未完成的非同步對等名稱解析作業時，會呼叫這個方法，它會作為 「 沒有作業 」 (NO OP)。If this method is called when an asynchronous peer name resolution operation is not outstanding, it acts as a "no operation" (NO OP). `userState`必須提供物件，因為它用來追蹤特定的非同步呼叫，當多個呼叫正在進行中。The `userState` object must be provided since it is used to track a specific asynchronous call when multiple calls are in progress. 此呼叫端提供的物件是唯一的每個對等名稱解析要求。This caller-supplied object is unique for each peer name resolution request. 這個方法會立即傳回，但作業可能會或可能立即取消。This method will return immediately, but the operation may or may not immediately cancel. 所傳回的事件引數事件包含可輪詢來判斷是否取消的用戶端的欄位。The event arguments returned by the event contains a field which can be polled by clients to determine whether cancellation occurred. 呼叫這個方法可確保 ResolveCompleted 事件信號會儘速與事件引數設定為`true`。Calling this method ensures the ResolveCompleted event will be signaled as soon as possible with the event argument set to `true`.

span.span: The parameters cannot be .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ResolveCompleted As EventHandler(Of ResolveCompletedEventArgs)

summary.span: 當特定 的對等名稱解析要求完成時， 事件會發出信號。

span.span: The event is signaled when a peer name resolution request for a specific has completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會一次引發事件，找不到，每個端點，而且一次時已找到所有端點時，才會引發此事件。The event will be raised once for each endpoint found, and this event will be raised only once when all endpoints have been found. 如果也會引發此事件作業會在錯誤完成或取消。This event will also be raised if the operation completes in error or is canceled.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ResolveProgressChanged As EventHandler(Of ResolveProgressChangedEventArgs)

summary.span: 每當針對特定 的 作業回應中找到 物件時，會發出此事件。

span.span: This event is signaled whenever a object is found in response to a operation for a specific .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果有多個物件存在的 cloud 中進行查詢，會發出此事件一次針對每個找到。If multiple objects exist in the cloud(s) being queried, this event is signaled once for each found.
